paper_abstract: In this paper we completely describe all continuous migrative triangular norms. Since the migrative property excludes both idempotent and nilpotent classes, the characterization and construction is carried out by solving a functional equation for additive generators of strict t-norms. We also study cases when the construction results in a smooth generator. (c) 2007 Elsevier B.V All rights reserved.
paper_title: On continuous triangular norms that are migrative
